member.name: XAUDIO2_VOICE_DETAILS
member.summary: Contains information about the creation flags, input channels, and sample rate of a voice.

member.name: XAUDIO2_VOICE_DETAILS.CreationFlags
member.summary: Flags used to create the voice; see the individual voice interfaces for more information.

member.name: XAUDIO2_VOICE_DETAILS.ActiveFlags
member.summary: Flags that are currently set on the voice.

member.name: XAUDIO2_VOICE_DETAILS.InputChannels
member.summary: The number of input channels the voice expects.

member.name: XAUDIO2_VOICE_DETAILS.InputSampleRate
member.summary: The input sample rate the voice expects.
